description: From French patriotique, from Late Latin patriōticus, from Ancient Greek πατριωτικός (patriōtikós), from πατριώτης (patriṓtēs).

adjectives.description: patriotic (comparative more patriotic, superlative most patriotic)

entries.meaning: Inspired by or showing patriotism; done out of love of one's country; zealously and unselfishly devoted to the service of one's country
A postage stamp, Civil War token, etc. bearing a patriotic design.
examples: Most patriotics in copper or brass are common. They are rare in off-metals.
